page_content:
100% Renewable Energy 
by 2030
Investing in wind and solar to reach 100% renewable energy  
across all business operations by 2030.80% Renewable Energy 
by 2024
Investing in wind and solar to reach 80% renewable energy across all business 
operations by 2024. We expect to reach ~40% renewable energy by the end of 2019.Net Zero Carbon 
by 2040
Deploying our technology and people to reach net zero carbon  
across Amazon by 2040, one decade ahead of the Paris Agreement.
50% Shipments Net Zero Carbon
by 2030
Our vision to make all Amazon shipments net zero carbon, 
with 50% of all shipments net zero carbon by 2030.Paris Agreement 10 Years Early
6
